DOC.brief_summary: Prospective , non-randomized , multi-center study assess long term safety efficacy self expandable sirolimus elute Xposition S stent treatment unprotected leave main coronary artery disease .
DOC.brief_title: Clinical Study Evaluate STENTYS Xposition S Treatment Unprotected Left Main Coronary Artery Disease
DOC.detailed_description: In treatment unprotected leave main coronary artery ( ULMCA ) disease , previous mono-center study show promising result previous generation self-expandable STENTYS stent ( paclitaxel elute stent , deliver via withdrawal sheath ) . The TRUNC study aim assess large scale Xposition S treatment ULMCA disease . The Xposition S sirolimus elute stent , mount balloon delivery system . The study aim collect clinical practice routine data 200 patient .
DOC.criteria: Main Subject ≥ 18 year old ; Presence coronary artery stenosis unprotected Left Main ( LM ) Coronary Artery indicate PCI Xposition S stent treatment Left Main Coronary Artery reference vessel diameter range 2.5 mm 6.0 mm ; The subject able provide voluntary informed consent , willing comply study requirement sign write informed consent . Main Recent STEMI ( < 1 month ) ; SYNTAX score ≥ 33 ; Highly calcify lesion excessive tortuosity target lesion site ; Subject unable comply dual antiplatelet therapy recommend per guideline ; Planned cardiac surgery valve intervention within next 12 month . Participation investigational drug device study reach primary endpoint .
